title: Paradigm Affordance Matrix
description: An interactive matrix visualization showing how different visualization paradigms (Timeline, Map, Network, Chart, Flowchart) afford different learning interactions across Bloom's Taxonomy cognitive levels.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Education
Instructional Design
Visualization
Bloom's Taxonomy
learningObjectives: Identify the relationship between visualization paradigms and cognitive levels
Evaluate which visualization types best support specific learning objectives
Select appropriate visualization paradigms for instructional design projects

controls.description: Hover over cells to see affordance descriptions
Hover over column headers to see Bloom's level details
Click row labels or cells to select and highlight a paradigm
